structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - COUNCIL MEETINGS AND PROCEDURE
Sec. 1-1043. - ROBERT'S RULES OF ORDER, WHEN APPLICABLE.

law.catch_line: ROBERT'S RULES OF ORDER, WHEN APPLICABLE.
law.text: Procedural matters not covered by the rules contained in this article shall be governed by Robert's Rules of Order. (Code 1959 , ยง2-23) Charter reference: Organization, officers, rules, meetings, ยง2.3 et seq.
